metric.name: IsRequiredInterface
metric.description: Indicates if the dependency is a required interface. ((p)) This metric has value 1 for dependencies with stereotype "use", and value 0 for dependencies that do not have stereotype "use".

metric.name: IsBusiness
metric.description: Indicates if the operation is assigned to Business. ((p)) This metric has value 1 for interfaces with stereotype "Business", and value 0 for interfaces that do not have stereotype "Business".

metric.name: IsBusiness
metric.description: Indicates if the interface (provided) is assigned to Business. ((p)) This metric has value 1 for interfaces with stereotype "Business", and value 0 for interfaces that do not have stereotype "Business".

metric.name: IsBusiness
metric.description: Indicates if the dependency (required interface) is assigned to Business. ((p)) This metric has value 1 for dependencies with stereotype "Business", and value 0 for dependencies that do not have stereotype "Business".

metric.name: IsBusiness
metric.description: Indicates if the component is assigned to Business. ((p)) This metric has value 1 for components with stereotype "Business", and value 0 for components that do not have stereotype "Business".

metric.name: BusinessInterfaceViaOP
metric.description: Indicates if the interface is assigned to Business through some operation.

metric.name: BusinessComponentViaPIF
metric.description: The number of provided interfaces linked via a 'Business' dependency.

metric.name: BusinessComponentViaRIF
metric.description: The number of required interfaces linked via a 'Business' dependency.

projection.condition: (IsGUI=1 and IsBusiness > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (BusinessComponentViaPIF > 0 or BusinessComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and BusinessComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (BusinessComponentViaPIF > 0 or BusinessComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and BusinessComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and BusinessComponentViaOP > 0)

(IsGUI=1 and IsConcurrency > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (ConcurrencyComponentViaPIF > 0 or ConcurrencyComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and ConcurrencyComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (ConcurrencyComponentViaPIF > 0 or ConcurrencyComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and ConcurrencyComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and ConcurrencyComponentViaOP > 0)

(IsGUI=1 and IsDistribution > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (DistributionComponentViaPIF > 0 or DistributionComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and DistributionComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (DistributionComponentViaPIF > 0 or DistributionComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and DistributionComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and DistributionComponentViaOP > 0)

(IsGUI=1 and IsExceptionHandling > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (ExceptionHandlingComponentViaPIF > 0 or ExceptionHandlingComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and ExceptionHandlingComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (ExceptionHandlingComponentViaPIF > 0 or ExceptionHandlingComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and ExceptionHandlingComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and ExceptionHandlingComponentViaOP > 0)

(IsGUI=1 and IsLogging > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (LoggingComponentViaPIF > 0 or LoggingComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and LoggingComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (LoggingComponentViaPIF > 0 or LoggingComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and LoggingComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and LoggingComponentViaOP > 0)

(IsGUI=1 and IsPersistence > 0) or (IsGUI=1 and (PersistenceComponentViaPIF > 0 or PersistenceComponentViaRIF > 0)) or (IsGUI=1 and PersistenceComponentViaOP > 0) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and (PersistenceComponentViaPIF > 0 or PersistenceComponentViaRIF > 0)) or ((GUIComponentViaPIF > 0 or GUIComponentViaRIF > 0) and PersistenceComponentViaOP > 0) or (GUIComponentViaOP > 0 and PersistenceComponentViaOP > 0)

compoundmetric.term: CIBCGUIConcurrency + CIBCGUIDistribution + CIBCGUIExceptionHandling + CIBCGUIBusiness + CIBCGUILogging + CIBCGUIPersistence
IIBCGUIConcurrency + IIBCGUIDistribution + IIBCGUIExceptionHandling + IIBCGUIBusiness + IIBCGUILogging + IIBCGUIPersistence
